session.objective: Implement Phase 1 of GitHub Actions local testing epic: Add actionlint validation to pre-commit hook, Validate-PrePR.ps1, and Worktrunk config. Update SHIFT-LEFT.md documentation.

workLog: Explored repository structure and existing validation infrastructure
Added workflow YAML validation to scripts/Validate-PrePR.ps1 (validation 3.5)
Updated .config/wt.toml to include actionlint in pre-merge hooks
Updated .agents/devops/SHIFT-LEFT.md with workflow YAML validation section and validation sequence table
Updated Validate-PrePR.ps1 header comment to reflect new validation sequence
Created .actrc configuration file for act (nektos/act) with optimized defaults
Created scripts/Test-WorkflowLocally.ps1 PowerShell wrapper for act
Updated SHIFT-LEFT.md with comprehensive local workflow testing documentation
Documented supported vs unsupported workflows for local testing
Created .yamllint.yml configuration with GitHub Actions-optimized rules
Added yamllint validation to scripts/Validate-PrePR.ps1 (validation 3.9, non-blocking)
Updated SHIFT-LEFT.md with YAML style validation documentation
Documented yamllint vs actionlint relationship and use cases
